messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello kill ur ssself if you are a faggot

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Spacepizza Division

Cargo: It looks like a neighbouring station accidentally delivered their pizza to you instead

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Fitness Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chemistry.
